markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distant Cackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=5597) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Kholo](/Heritages.aspx?ID=332) heritage

</column>

---

It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell. You can cast [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1740) once per day as a 1st-rank occult innate spell.
name: Distant Cackle
